section.para: Warehouse Locations--also known as Locations--are the specific, unique material sites where inventory warehouse locations and Inventory is located inside a Warehouse. If the ARBL naming convention is being enforced within a Warehouse, Locations may be identified by aisle, rack, bin, and Location number. Locations may also exist within Warehouse Zones, if Zones are defined for the specified Warehouse. In most cases, related Items will be stored near to each other to simplify picking and Inventory counting. To access a master list of Warehouse Locations, select the "Warehouse Locations" option. The "Warehouse Locations" screen displays information on all existing Warehouse Locations, including Warehouse code, Location name, Location description, and whether the Location is netable or restricted. When displaying available Warehouse Locations, you are presented with the following options:
